description technical detail:
Lenovo ThinkVision LT1423p - 13.3" Widescreen LED Monitor
For mainstream professionals and road-warriors who demand better collaboration and mobility, ThinkVisons LT1423p mobile touch monitor offers an industry leading "on-the-go" solution. With its slim and light design, it is portable for any business occasion and can be connected easily using only one USB 3.0 cable for both video and power. As ThinkVisons mobile monitor, it packs a certified 10 point touch input and Thinkpad digitizer pen to provide a more immersive experience. In addition, it houses a 1600 x 900 resolution AH-IPS panel (Advanced High Performance In-Panel Switching) to make sharing and collaboration more comfortable and convenient.
display type: LED-backlit LCD monitor / TFT active matrix
